content: or, if Xmas is not you thing, happy [something-else] - I hope you get som reason
I'm taking some time off - visiting family in Auckland NZ. Will only be online ocacasionally for the next 8 days
Thanks Grahame, I would wish you a "white Christmas"... but that would be rude... I got a fresh blanket of snow...

His sand can be pretty white. He just gets bright blues and greens to mix it up a bit :)

Happy holidays to everyone
